bill.title: Creating Opportunities Now for Necessary and Effective Care Technologies (CONNECT) for Health Act of 2021 CONNECT for Health Act of 2021
bill.description: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to expand access to telehealth services, and for other purposes.

history.action: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
